Articles.Content:
After that disaster, I rebuild my hill in an explodium sea on Eve.

My explodium hill.

I make a hill with a democratic civilization on it on kerbin, and surround it with empty hills for people to be king of in my civilization. My civilization. Also, a navy to protect the civilization hills is in orbit over kerbin.

I turn this into civ 5 and send an army of giant death robots and crush your peaceful civilization.

So, yeah.

My hill.

Actually, my navy does an orbital bombardment of your robots. Also, you could've just joined us and had your own hill with a strong navy to protect it. now you don't have a hill. I still have one, and plenty of other hills for people who want to join me. I won't take theirs.

I restart the universe, making only one hill.

My hill.

> 
> I restart the universe, making only one hill.
> My hill.

I fly a rocket into space carrying a hill. I carry it to a different universe.

My hill somewere in the middle of space with no air.

(If you restart the universe, my hill will still be alive)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-19T18:26:11Z" title="10/19/2015 06:26  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 19, 2015</time> by Dcseal**

I restart ALL universes.

My transuniversal hills.

I rebuild my civilization and make more hills that are unoccupied and invite everyone to live there. Everyone gets a hill to be king of! Also, I've got a navy in orbit and multiple planet to orbit and other planetary defenses and a strong military and planetary shielding and all kinds of fail safes to make sure everything and everyone living there is safe!

Looks like it's time for a super star destroyer!

I own every hill, with my army of self-reproducing/regenerating giant death robots, my 20 super star destroyers, and millions of probes, each capable of MAJOR destrouction!

Also, a hidden bunker housing an army of 50,000 master chiefs.

My hills.
You could've just asked and I would have given/made you some hills. my forerunner/imperial navy dispatches yours. also, I have cortana hostage, so the masterchiefs are null and void.

Uh...\*Thinking quickly"\*

Send in the death star!

My death robots are still alive.

I use ctrl-v and I bring back cortana.

I punch everyone off their hills, uniting all hills under one ruler(me! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

My hill empire on Jool

One does not simply punch master chief.

My hills.
I brutally murder you. My hills.

One does not simply murder 10,000 master chiefs and 800 giant death robots.

My hills.

I make my own hill.

So yeah. Our hills.

There can only be one!

MY MANY HILLS!

I slay all existing rulers using the Kraken.

My empire of hills around Jool.
The Kraken was obliterated by The Big Crunch. The new universe is created so that there is a new hill for ME.

My army's still alive!

My hill.

I become a member of your inner circle, and murder you to take power.

My hill and army.

We're very exclusive.

My hill

I nuke everything and everyone related to you including you.

My radioactive hill.

I black hole Kerbol.

My empire and army of hills on Pluto.

think again! I'm in an underground bunker while my master chiefs use their shields.

stll my hill!
